Hi

You can use AppPerfect DevTest for testing eclipse plugin. Integrate
De=
vTest in your development Eclipse and use UnitTester for testing
plugins.
T=
he product will automatically generate testcases for each method in
your pl=
ugin. Product also has nice UI for adding/editing testcases.

Regards,
Sudh=
an
